text: Guo Mei (born 24 July 1967) is a Chinese rower. She competed in the women's double sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of China Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games
title: Guo Mei (rower)
